thread.title: Service Pro to Debut ServeSensor at PestWorld
thread.title_full: Service Pro to Debut ServeSensor at PestWorld

title: Service Pro to Debut ServeSensor at PestWorld
text:
Subscribe Service Pro to Debut ServeSensor at PestWorld ServSensor is a sensor-based monitoring device and software solution that keeps an eye on activity in bait stations, traps, and sends notice of all occurring wildlife and rodent activity. October 16, 2015 
COLUMBUS - Between Oct, 20-23, ServicePro will take part in PestWorld 2015, in Nashville, Tenn,, illustrating the new sensor enhancements to their product ServSuite. This year at PestWorld at booth #239, ServicePro will be launching its newest product: ServSensor . ServSensor is a sensor-based monitoring device and software solution that keeps an eye on activity in bait stations, traps, and ultimately your customer locations, and sends notice of all occurring wildlife and rodent activity. The initial release will be based on both motion and thermal technology to ensure accuracy and is built on an open architecture to potentially use other types of sensors or devices in the future. ServSensor interfaces with ServSuite as a module for monitoring, reporting, and even interfaces with your mobile device to provide a text or email message when activity occurs. Visit PestWorld booth #239 or visit www.ServSensor.com to learn more. Expanded Label for Contrac All-Weather Blox October 16, 2015 
Bell Laboratories announced that Contrac All-Weather Blox is now available with an amended label for approved use on 11 additional species. Read More ‘Duck Dynasty’ Star Si to Appear at Oldham Chemicals PestWorld Booth October 15, 2015 
Oldham Chemicals Company invites PestWorld '15 attenddees to its booth (#441) to meet Si Robertson, one of the stars of the reality television program "Duck Dynasty." Read More Bayer Announces Fall Savings Program October 14, 2015 
The promotion includes savings on Maxforce FC Magnum Roach Gel, Maxforce FC Select Roach Gel and Temprid SC. Read More The Pulse
